title: Enemy Enchantress
description: The war is over, but the battle has just begun. Aislinn knows the husband she wishes for is no more than a fantasy. Her discovery of a man to be hers brings no comfort, for a Centeris could never love her for what she Sidhe.As she tries to hide her true self from the gentle warrior, death stalks her. The perpetrator behind a series of attacks wants more than to destroy the precarious peace—they want her powers.To save her people, she must reveal herself and risk his love or leave him to face the challenge—alone.
author: Amy Ruttan
